#summary This page describes the features that will be included in the next releases of SMaRt.
#labels Featured,Phase-Requirements

= SMaRt v0.6 =

  * Include JUnit tests (for critical modules).
  * Include stress tests (for the counter application).
  * Improve authenticated channels by allowing one of three possible modes of operation: periodical key renewal, SSL sockets, or plain sockets over IPSec.
  * Make checkpoints to stable memory.


= SMaRt v0.7 =

  * Integrate with [http://www.navigators.di.fc.ul.pt/software/depspace/ DepSpace] to construct a BFT coordination service.
